roleset.name: causing growth of dense, fibrous tissue

example.name: sclerose-v: Arg0 as doctor
example.text: Dr. Mary successfully sclerosed the bleeding esophageal varices.

example.name: sclerotic-j: arg1
example.text: Background stroma is sclerotic ; no calcifications are noted .

example.name: sclerosing-n: Arg1
example.text: The sclerosing of tubules produces translucent areas in the dentin.
